caption:
It’s Fall in the city! and there’s still time to have a fabulous Vancouver staycation. While international and recreational travel has not resumed why not experience Vancouver like a tourist. 

Here are a few of our favourite things to do within walking distance of our Waterfront Bombay Brow Bar @bombaybrowbar

🌳 Vancouverites love the outdoors and if you are an outdoors-lover, start your day with a stroll along the Waterfront Seawall. 

🎢 Experience this immersive real-life action flying experience at Flyover Canada @flyovercanadavancouver. You’re sure to be impressed.

📷 Venture down the street to the Vancouver Convention Center and walk around the building for unique Vancouver photo ops like the giant water droplet statue!

👉 No trip is complete without a little pampering! Stop 🛑 by Bombay Brow Bar for the ultimate afternoon escape. We highly recommend the Marma Massage; an ayurvedic facial massage. It’s the perfect way to feel energized and refreshed as you head into the Fall. 

Check out our blog ➡️ Things to do: The Perfect Downtown Vancouver Staycation Day!  for more Vancouver sightseeing ideas.

First time at @bombaybrowbar? Book your appointment ahead of time with code WATERFRONT15, and make it part of your Vancouver Staycation plans!
